attributes.action: please help Re-open community cottage hospitals
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to consider this action as it makes perfect sense.
attributes.background: Please help to Re-open our community cottage hospitals for those who are waiting on care packages and free up beds in our main hospital's. This will help the NHS staff taking pressure off them and could be run by health workers (NVQ staff)

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local hospital provision are a matter for the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament.
